publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-623 Mr Jack McConnell: Ethical Standards in Public Life Bill etc. (Scotland) Bill - Finance- —That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to the expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of the expenses of the Scottish Ministers in the consequence of the Act.

S1M-623 Mr Jack McConnell: Ethical Standards in Public Life Bill etc. (Scotland) Bill - Finance- —That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to the expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of sums required to meet expenses of the Scottish Ministers in consequence of the Act.

S1M-623 Mr Jack McConnell: Ethical Standards in Public Life Bill etc. (Scotland) Bill - Finance- —That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to the expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of sums required to meet expenses of the Scottish Ministers in consequence of the Act.

S1M-623 Mr Jack McConnell: Ethical Standards in Public Life Bill etc. (Scotland) Bill - Finance- —That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to the expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of sums required to meet expenses of the Scottish Ministers in consequence of the Act.

S1M-623 Mr Jack McConnell: Ethical Standards in Public Life Bill etc. (Scotland) Bill - Finance- —That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to the expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of sums required to meet expenses of the Scottish Ministers in consequence of the Act.

S1M-623 Mr Jack McConnell: Ethical Standards in Public Life Bill etc. (Scotland) Bill - Finance- —That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to the expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of sums required to meet expenses of the Scottish Ministers in consequence of the Act.

S1M-623 Mr Jack McConnell: Ethical Standards in Public Life Bill etc. (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to the expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of sums required to meet expenses of the Scottish Ministers in consequence of the Act.
